name: Feathered & Furious
description:
PVP-Multiplayer Racing game developed for its unique Arcade Build. 

Compete against your friends and Win the Feathered Derby!

Playable on the Computer via two controllers or Keyboard.

Player1 : Use Xbox controller; Player2 : PS controller or Keyboard.

Control Scheme for Keyboard:

Left arrow & Right arrow : Speed up;

W & D :change the direction;

Space : Jump;

E: Ducking.
